solution.text:
Volume of carton \(=_{j}_cm \times _{k}_cm \times _{l}_cm\)
\(=_{{j*k*l}}_\,cm^3\)
Volume of godown \(=_{{m*k}}_m \times _{{n*l}}_m \times _{{o*j}}_m\)
\(=_{{m*k*n*l*o*j}}_\,m^3\)
Total number of cartons that can be stored \(= \frac{volume\,of\,godown}{volume\,of\,carton}\)
\(=\frac{_{{m*k*n*l*o*j}}_\,m^3}{_{{j*k*l}}_\,cm^3}\)
\(=\frac{_{{m*k*n*l*o*j}}_ \times {10}^6\,cm^3}{_{{j*k*l}}_\,cm^3}\)
\(=_{{(m*n*o)*10**6}}_\)

content.text: How many cartons of size measuring \(_{j}_\)cm \(\times \, _{k}_\)cm \(\times \,_{l}_\)cm can be stored in a godown of size \(_{{m*k}}_\)m \(\times \,_{{n*l}}_\)m \(\times \,_{{o*j}}_\)m.
